extends AbstractBulkResources<IpInterfaceRestRep>
    IP Interfaces resources.

    Base URL: /compute/ip-interfaces

      • create

        public IpInterfaceRestRep create(java.net.URI hostId,
                        IpInterfaceCreateParam input)
        Creates an IP interface for the given host.

        API Call: POST /compute/hosts/{hostId}/ip-interfaces

        Parameters:
        hostId - the ID of the host.
        input - the create configuration.
        Returns:
        the created IP interface.

      • update

        input - the updated configuration.
        Returns:
